QuestData.Title: Target of Opportunity: Sra'thik Hivelord
QuestData.Description:
Near the ocean, on the eastern side of Sra'vess, there is a cavern that leads to a network of caves.
From there, the Sra'thik Hivelord maintains Sra'vess and plots against us. If we manage to take him out, we'll disrupt their operations for days.
Let's go to it.
